Pre-Game Insights: India secured an impressive victory against the USA in their recent match, while Canada suffered a defeat against Pakistan.
Both teams are gearing up for a competitive and skillful encounter.
Fans eagerly await the showcase of talent and sportsmanship in this highly anticipated game.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match is set to take place on 15th June, 2024, at the Central Broward Regional Park Stadium Turf Ground, Florida, Lauderhill.
The match will be broadcasted on Star Sports and live streamed on Disney+ Hotstar.
